description:
Season: 20
Original Air Date: 3/14/2007

Donna tells Phoebe that she shouldn’t let anything get in the way of true love. Phoebe is skeptical of Donna’s support. She is concerned how her relationship with Rick could affect Ridge and Brooke’s relationship. Rick convinces Ashley into accepting the job offer. Rick and Ashley leave Café Russe and head to Insomnia for some coffee.  When they arrive, Phoebe is jealous seeing Rick with Ashley together and is surprised to learn that Rick and Ashley had dinner. Privately, Phoebe tells Rick that she doesn’t want to keep the distance between them. Jackie brings Hope to Nick’s place, interrupting his date with Taylor. Nick warns Jackie not to interfere in his relationship with Taylor. Jackie wants Rick and Phoebe to give into their feelings to stop Brooke and Ridge’s wedding.
